posts.post_title: FS: T206 Matthewson portrait SGC 70 - SOLD!!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jimi
Scans available upon request.  Ultimately would like to sell, but might be up for trades/cash especially if a Cobb or Wagner is involved.  I'm in need of paying off a recent auction win, so cash will need to be involved somewhere.  [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]  

Beautiful card, and looking for $2,450.  Thanks for taking a look!
